Title: 40871 - # Reasons Men Should Look at Plastic Surgery Differently
Direction: 500 Words. Discuss 3-6 different reasons that men should be looking at plastic surgery differently. Since men often disregard plastic surgery and consider it an option that is only for women, create a list of facts, information, and plastic surgery procedures that could make men consider plastic surgery for themselves. Your target audience is men and this article will be posted on a men’s blog that discusses a wide range of topics such as style, dating, gadgets, etc. You can link to your target URL by mentioning THERMlift as a procedure that men might want to consider having done.
